titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I attended the Convocation until it was time to go to the station for the 12.50 to Durham. The proceedings were monstrously dull. I made a brief speech on Education. On arriving in the Deanery I cleared my table, & wrote many letters.
